mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(a.repair_no) FROM tb_repair a WHERE a.del_yn = 'N'

SELECT a.repair_no, a.repair_nm, a.repair_req_dt, a.repair_res_dt , b.file_path, b.origin_nm, b.file_nm FROM tb_repair a LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file b ON a.repair_no = b.ref_no AND b.ref_info = 'RPIR' AND b.file_ord = 1 AND b.del_yn = 'N' WHERE a.del_yn = 'N'
ORDER BY a.repair_req_dt DESC, a.repair_no DESC
